<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;81566d37.1412">   <title>Modern Languages Open supports early career researchers with Authors Fund </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;81566d37.1412</link>   <description> Liverpool University Press Open Access Publishing Fund<br><br>The publication of two papers from the Modern Languages Open launch&lt;http://www.modernlanguagesopen.org/index.php/mlo/issue/view/4&gt; selection has been facilitated by the Liverpool University Press Open Access Authors Fund&lt;http://www.liverpooluniversitypress.co.uk/index.php?option=com_content&amp;view=article&amp;id=145&amp;Itemid=6&gt;.<br><br>The aim of the fund is to support gold open access&lt;http://libguides.liv.ac.uk/oaterms#gold&gt; publication by early career researchers in the humanities and social sciences. LUP authors may donate all or part of their royalties to the Fund, and all contributions are then match-funded by the press. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T08:45:07+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Baldry, Chantel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;81566d37.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;72e00b1a.1412">   <title>Table of Contents: German Politics and Society (Vol. 32, Issue 4) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;72e00b1a.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>We are pleased to announce that the latest issue of German Politics and Society has been published by Berghahn Journals. The first article examines the GAL's decisions to join and to end the CDU-Green coalition. The second article analyzes the differences between chancellors, vice chancellors, and ministers of the inner or residual cabinets of the German federal governments between 1949 and 2000. The final article examines how the GDR is currently addressed in history and literature curricula for the Oberstufe. The issue concludes with forum and book review sections. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-11T19:14:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Young Lee</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;72e00b1a.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;ef84113c.1410">   <title>Modern Languages Open Launch Press Release \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 28th October 2014</title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;ef84113c.1410</link>   <description> Modern Languages Open&lt;http://www.modernlanguagesopen.org/&gt; Launch Press Release \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 28th October 2014<br><br>Modern Languages Open&lt;http://www.modernlanguagesopen.org/&gt; launched by Liverpool University Press<br><br>Liverpool University Press, one of the world’s leading publishers in the modern languages, is proud to announce the official launch of Modern Languages Open (MLO)&lt;http://www.modernlanguagesopen.org/&gt; \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd a groundbreaking new interdisciplinary platform for the modern languages. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-28T11:36:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Baldry, Chantel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;ef84113c.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;d33ec0b0.1410">   <title>PS... GfdS-Vortrag am Mittwoch (15. Oktober) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;d33ec0b0.1410</link>   <description> PS:<br>Mittwoch, der 15. Oktober ist nat\ufffd\ufffdrlich schon in drei Tagen; nicht erst &quot;in etwa vier Wochen&quot;, wie ich versehentlich geschrieben habe. Ich bitte den Fehler, der mit &quot;kopieren und einf\ufffd\ufffdgen&quot; zu tun hat, zu entschuldigen.   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-12T12:52:29+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dr Falco Pfalzgraf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;d33ec0b0.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;993476a2.1410">   <title>GfdS-Vortrag am Mittwoch (15. Oktober) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;993476a2.1410</link>   <description> Liebe GfdS-Mitglieder, liebe Interessierte,<br><br>ich m\ufffd\ufffdchte noch einmal an den n\ufffd\ufffdchsten Vortrag der Gesellschaft f\ufffd\ufffdr deutsche Sprache erinnern: Er findet am 15. Oktober ab 18 Uhr, also in etwa vier Wochen, auf dem Mile End Campus des Queen Mary College der Universit\ufffd\ufffdt London statt. Die Veranstaltung ist kostenlos, und eine GfdS-Mitgliedschaft ist nicht notwendig. Alle sind willkommen! [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-12T12:41:34+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Dr Falco Pfalzgraf</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;993476a2.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;1f96e234.1409">   <title>FINAL REMINDER - UCL HUMANITY AND ANIMALITY CONFERENCE </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;1f96e234.1409</link>   <description> *Dear All,*<br><br>*A final reminder for the UCL Humanity and Animality conference. Please<br>find the registration details and the conference programme at*:<br>http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/humanity-and-animality-in-20th-and-21st-century-culture-narratives-theories-histories-an-tickets-12769440741?aff=es2<br><br>*If you are interested in attending the conference, please choose the<br>session(s) you would like attend from the multiple choice menu. *<br><br>*\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdMany thanks and best wishes,*<br><br>*[image:<br>https://ci6.googleusercontent.com/proxy/RnNZfQn2o2xpggJQqefCOervMbPIci5mujDPJnvl43kv6Rtxjyh5gHN_JKVzeU-aaGz3pePFgxfoAAtZJZNx8mveVTc-11j98EfuAJVcumUenA=s0-d-e1-ft#https://ssl.gstatic.com/ui/v1/icons/mail/images/cleardot.gif][image:<br>https://ssl.gstatic.com/ui/v1/icons/mail/images/cleardot.gif]*<br><br>*Stefano Bellin*<br><br>University College London (UCL)<br><br>Joint Faculty Institute of Graduate Studies [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-09T21:09:41+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stefano Bellin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;1f96e234.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;5166f402.1409">   <title>New Issue: German Politics and Society (Vol. 32, Issue 3) - The 2013 Bundestag Election pt.II </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;5166f402.1409</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>We are pleased to announce that the latest issue of German Politics and Society has been published by Berghahn Journals. This special issue is titled The 2013 Bundestag Election (Part II). The contributions in this issue delve into a variety of salient issues. It is hoped that the reader will gain a fuller understanding of the German political situation, as well as some insight into what one might expect looking into the future. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-02T19:37:56+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Young Lee</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;5166f402.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;db6daebd.1408">   <title>Humanity and Animality Conference - Registration now open </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;db6daebd.1408</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Registration for the Humanity and Animality conference is now open. Please<br>find the registration details and the conference programme at:<br>http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/humanity-and-animality-in-20th-and-21st-century-culture-narratives-theories-histories-an-tickets-12769440741?aff=es2<br><br>If you are interested in attending the conference, please choose the<br>session(s) you would like attend from the multiple choice menu. Further<br>information about the conference will be uploaded on the UCL JFIGS website<br>by the end of August. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-27T00:39:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stefano Bellin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;db6daebd.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;2547ad84.1407">   <title>CFP Humanity and Animality Interdisciplinary Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;2547ad84.1407</link>   <description> *Dear Contemporary Germany, *<br><br>*submissions for abstracts for the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdHumanity and Animality\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>interdisciplinary conference is still open. Please see the Call for Papers<br>below:*<br><br>Call for papers:<br><br>University College London (UCL)<br><br>Joint Faculty Institute of Graduate Studies<br><br>*Humanity and Animality in 20th and 21st Century Culture:*<br><br>*Narratives, Theories, Histories. An Interdisciplinary Conference*<br><br>*15 September, 2014*<br><br>This interdisciplinary conference takes up an important debate in a field<br>of growing importance in the humanities, where animal studies,<br>post-humanism, and eco-criticism have surged in recent years. The<br>definition of mankind seems necessarily to pass through an understanding of<br>what constitutes the animal. Philosophically, [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-16T22:14:52+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stefano Bellin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;2547ad84.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;79b28a60.1407">   <title>Table of Contents: German Politics and Society (Vol. 32, Issue 2) - The 2013 Bundestag Election </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;79b28a60.1407</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>We are pleased to announce that the latest issue of German Politics and Society has been published by Berghahn Journals. This special issue is titled The 2013 Bundestag Election (Part I). In light of the importance of Germany in European and global politics today, and the current resonance of the German system abroad, this two-part special issue of German Politics and Society is devoted to the 2013 Bundestag election. The contributions in this issue delve into a variety of salient issues. It is hoped that the reader will gain a fuller understanding of the German political situation, as [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-14T22:17:41+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Young Lee</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;79b28a60.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;b4f6e55c.1407">   <title>CFP Humanity and Animality Interdisciplinary Conference (UCL-15 September) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;b4f6e55c.1407</link>   <description> Call for papers:<br><br>University College London (UCL)<br><br>Joint Faculty Institute of Graduate Studies<br><br>*Humanity and Animality in 20th and 21st Century Culture:*<br><br>*Narratives, Theories, Histories. An Interdisciplinary Conference*<br><br>*15 September, 2014*<br><br>This interdisciplinary conference takes up an important debate in a field<br>of growing importance in the humanities, where animal studies,<br>post-humanism, and eco-criticism have surged in recent years. The<br>definition of mankind seems necessarily to pass through an understanding of<br>what constitutes the animal. Philosophically, what distinguishes, or indeed<br>brings together humanity and animality has been the subject of debate from<br>Aristotle\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds understanding of man as \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd*z\ufffd\ufffdon logon echon*\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-10T01:58:19+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stefano Bellin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=CONTEMPORARYGERMANY;b4f6e55c.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
